specials.name: Change Shape
specials.description: (concentrate, divine, polymorph, transmutation) Giant bat with fangs +19 for 2d8+11 piercing.

specials.name: Drink Blood
specials.description: (divine, necromancy) When Drinking Blood, Jilia regains 10 HP.

specials.name: Turn to Mist
specials.description: (concentrate, divine, transmutation) Jilia turns into a cloud of vapor, as the gaseous form spell, or back to its normal form. Jilia loses fast healing while in gaseous form. She can remain in this form indefinitely.

specials.name: (A)
specials.description: If a creature dies after being reduced to 0 HP by Drink Blood, Jilia can turn this victim into a vampire by donating some of its own blood to the victim and burying the victim in earth for 3 nights. If the new vampire is lower level than its creator, it is under the creator’s control. If Jilia controls too many spawn at once (as determined by the GM), strong-willed spawn can free themselves by succeeding at a Will saving throw against the vampire’s Will DC.

specials.name: (F)
specials.description: Frequency Once per day. Requirements Jilia hasn’t acted yet on this turn. Effect Jilia expends the power stored in its signet ring. This gives her the ability to cast one prepared spell it had already previously cast today, without spending a spell slot. She must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell’s other requirements.

specials.name: Steady Spellcasting
specials.description: If another creature’s reaction would disrupt Jilia’s spellcasting action, she attempts a DC 15 flat check. If she succeeds, its action isn’t disrupted.

immunity.value: death effects, disease, paralyze, poison, sleep
